name: Tome Unfurled
description: Read 1 paragraph of an academic text!
entityEffect: Halfway through, thou dost forget what thou read!
relicEffect: Thou dost instantly make a profound connection to another field of study.

name: Annotation of Arcane Knowledge
description: Highlight or annotate 3 key points!
entityEffect: Thine highlighter is missing or has dried up!
relicEffect: Future readings bring greater understanding, as if thou hadst read the text before.
areaDesc: Where Knowledge is Written into Scholarly Form

name: Scroll of Summarization
description: Write a 1-sentence summary!
entityEffect: Thou dost struggle to phrase it simply!
relicEffect: Future summaries come with ease, for thy mind can now grasp the heart of any text.
areaDesc: Where Knowledge is Written into Scholarly Form

name: Scholar’s Sprint
description: Study with focus for 5 minutes!
entityEffect: An alert, sound, or thought derails thee!
relicEffect: The next deep focus session shall be effortless, for time itself bends to thy will.

name: First Word Ritual
description: Write literally any word to begin!
entityEffect: Thou dost hesitate, doubting the worth of the first word!
relicEffect: The next sentence shall flow from thee as if a river, perfectly formed and without struggle.
areaDesc: Where Knowledge is Written into Scholarly Form

name: Typing Tempest
description: Write for 3 uninterrupted minutes!
entityEffect: Thou dost keep rewriting the same phrase!
relicEffect: Thou shalt feel a sudden surge of inspiration, giving thee power and focus for thy next writing session.
areaDesc: Where Knowledge is Written into Scholarly Form

name: Formatting Enchantment
description: Fix 1 citation, heading, or structure!
entityEffect: A missing citation throws thee into chaos!
relicEffect: Future citation tasks shall be done with great speed and perfect order.
areaDesc: Where Knowledge is Written into Scholarly Form

name: Form of Minimal Doom
description: Complete one small section of paperwork!
entityEffect: A required field makes no sense!
relicEffect: The next form thou submits shall vanish from thy mind, for it is already approved and filed away.
areaDesc: Where Academics Meet to be Judged

name: Calendar Conundrum
description: Schedule one task, meeting, or deadline!
entityEffect: The best time is already taken!
relicEffect: All meetings this week shall align perfectly, leaving thee with a rare abundance of time for all other tasks.
areaDesc: Where Academics Meet to be Judged

name: Goblet of Hydration
description: Drink a full glass of water!

name: Feast of Small Victories
description: Eat at least one proper meal!

name: Potion Brewer’s Trial
description: Make a cup of coffee, tea, or favourite beverage!

name: Stance of the Mindful Stretch
description: Stretch for at least 2 minutes!

name: Sprint of the Squirrel Knight
description: Engage in 5 minutes of movement!

name: Window of the World Beyond
description: Look outside, name three things thou dost see

name: Summoning of Fresh Air
description: Step outside for 2 minutes!

name: Grand Pilgrimage Outdoors
description: Take a walk, however short!

name: Illumination of the Study Keep
description: Adjust thy lighting to fit thy focus!

name: Soundtrack of Champions
description: Play a focus-boosting or mood-lifting tune!

name: Shield of the Sleepy Squirrel
description: Lie down, even if sleep evades thee!

name: Dimming of the Screens
description: Reduce blue light exposure before sleep!

name: Cozy Cocoon Ritual
description: Adjust blankets, pillows, and comfort to maximize relaxation!

name: Book of Gentle Escape
description: Read or listen to something soothing before sleep!

name: Whispered Gratitudes
description: List three small victories of the day!

name: Rule of Three Objects
description: Put away or clean three small things!

name: Time Traveler’s Sprint
description: Set a 5-minute timer and tidy as much as thou can!

name: Organizational Arcane Sigil
description: Label or categorize one small area!

name: Minimalist’s Trial
description: Declutter one item, donate or discard!

name: Desk of Academic Might
description: Clear thy workspace before beginning studies!

name: Verbal Summoning
description: Practice explaining a concept aloud, even if none listen!
entityEffect: Thou dost veer wildly off-topic!
relicEffect: Thy next explanation shall be so clear, it could charm a dragon from its hoard.

name: Ritual of Class Preparation
description: Draft one discussion question or slide!
entityEffect: A slide layout refuses to align properly!
relicEffect: The next class thou plans shall captivate all who listen.

name: Grand Seminar of Engagement
description: Pose a discussion question in class or online!
entityEffect: No student answers immediately!
relicEffect: All in thy next discussion shall be filled with a passion for the topic.

name: Final Scroll Begins
description: Write 1 sentence of the conclusion chapter!
entityEffect: Thou dost rewrite the same idea five times!
relicEffect: The next paragraph shall flow from thee as if a river, perfectly formed and without struggle.
areaDesc: Where Knowledge is Written into Scholarly Form

name: Ultimate Citation Challenge
description: Check & format one reference!
entityEffect: A source is missing and must be found!
relicEffect: Future citations shall be found without a trace of struggle.
areaDesc: Where Knowledge is Written into Scholarly Form

name: Final Data Reckoning
description: Analyze one result or edit a table!
entityEffect: Numbers seem incorrect, requiring double-checking!
relicEffect: A major insight strikes thee, illuminating thy path forward.
areaDesc: Where Knowledge is Written into Scholarly Form

name: Last Crusade Against Formatting
description: Fix one style, heading, or spacing issue!
entityEffect: A section disappears mysteriously!
relicEffect: Thy next document shall be edited with perfect order and speed.
areaDesc: Where Knowledge is Written into Scholarly Form

name: PowerPoint Pilgrimage
description: Make or edit one slide!
entityEffect: A crucial figure refuses to align correctly!
relicEffect: Thy next slide shall convey its message with a singular, perfect purpose.

name: Summoning of the Oral Script
description: Write & practice one minute of thy speech!
entityEffect: Thou dost struggle to phrase things simply!
relicEffect: Thy next spoken answer shall be flawless, a golden truth for all to hear.

name: Trial of the Mock Defense
description: Practice one question with a friend or mirror!
entityEffect: A practice query leaves thee speechless!
relicEffect: Thy next Q&A shall be a display of quick wit and profound knowledge.

name: Sacred Robing Ritual
description: Choose attire for the defense & feel powerful!
entityEffect: A button or zipper fails!
relicEffect: Thy next speaking task shall fill thee with a boldness that cannot be denied.

name: Title of a Thousand Revisions
description: Revise or finalize the title!
entityEffect: Thou dost change it thrice and remain unsatisfied!
relicEffect: A perfect title idea shall emerge, as if delivered to thee by a muse.
areaDesc: Where Knowledge is Written into Scholarly Form

name: Abstract Abyss
description: Edit one sentence of the abstract!
entityEffect: The abstract refuses to fit the word limit!
relicEffect: The next abstract thou writes shall be as clear as a mountain spring.
areaDesc: Where Knowledge is Written into Scholarly Form

name: Journal Alignment Conundrum
description: Check submission guidelines & adjust formatting!
entityEffect: The journal requires a citation format overhaul!
relicEffect: Thy next submission shall be looked upon with great favor.
areaDesc: Where Knowledge is Written into Scholarly Form

name: Final Button of Fate
description: Press submit and send the manuscript into the void!
entityEffect: The submission system crashes just after pressing submit!
relicEffect: Peer review feedback shall be surprisingly merciful.

name: Single Scroll of Judgment
description: Grade a single response, essay, or quiz question!
entityEffect: Thou canst not decipher the student’s handwriting!
relicEffect: Thy next grading task shall be completed swiftly, with perfect fairness.

name: Constructive Rune
description: Write one meaningful comment on a student’s work!
entityEffect: Thy feedback grows longer than the student’s work!
relicEffect: The feedback thou gives next shall be so clear and brief, it will be instantly understood.

name: Swift Assessment Sprint
description: Grade for 5 uninterrupted minutes!
entityEffect: A grading rubric is missing or inconsistent!
relicEffect: Thy next grading session shall pass in the blink of an eye.

name: Summoning of the Inbox
description: Open and skim unread emails without responding!
entityEffect: A single email spawns five follow-ups!
relicEffect: Thy future emails shall be answered with half the effort, for thy thoughts are organized and swift.

name: Single Scroll of Response
description: Reply to one student email!
entityEffect: The student’s question makes no sense!
relicEffect: Thy next email reply shall be a model of perfect communication.

name: Office Hour Invocation
description: Spend 10 minutes responding to student questions!
entityEffect: None attend thy office hours, and time is lost!
relicEffect: Thy next discussion will be filled with an uncommon energy and passion from all.

name: Roster of the Forgotten
description: Check or update attendance records!
entityEffect: A student on the roster has never been seen!
relicEffect: Thy future attendance tasks will be finished in half the time, for every name and face is now clear to thee.

name: Form of Institutional Doom
description: Submit one administrative form!
entityEffect: The form format is incorrect, requiring resubmission!
relicEffect: All forms thou submits from this point forward shall be accepted with ease.

name: Calendar of Despair
description: Schedule a class, meeting, or deadline!
entityEffect: The ideal time slot is already taken!
relicEffect: Thy future scheduling tasks shall be completed in half the time, with no conflict in sight.
